long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sherlock is designed for introspecting and debugging any Solana DeFi apps.

Simply add any public key, and you will be able to simulate as the user, enabling you to simulate transaction, introspect the details, instructions, transactions and more.

Sherlock is open sourced and built by Raccoons, the teams behind Jupiter and Meteora. Sherlock has been invaluable to the team since day 1, simulating as user to get their point of view, addressing user feedbacks and bugs.
Github Repo: https://github.com/TeamRaccoons/sherlock-wallet

0.0.3
- Fixed a bug where simulation was not working
- Quick Add address feature to instantly add new address on Approve Connection
